ai-patthana23.13:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.13:1.1_0: Not knowing the unskillful teachings, the cause is a condition for the inferior.
ai-patthana23.13:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana23.13:3.1_0: No skilled in the teaching of the skillful is a condition for the reason.
